name: Shadow Breach
description: Void portals flicker open across Orbis. Defeat the shades pouring out to protect nearby settlements.
participation: Fight any shadow-aligned enemy and run `!hy participate shadow_breach` to claim your bounty.
successMessage: Thanks for driving back the void energies!

name: Aurora Bloom
description: A brilliant aurora bathes the Gale Cliffs. Assist Skysong archivists in capturing resonance strands.
participation: Gather luminite or visit Skysong territory, then use `!hy participate aurora_bloom`.
successMessage: The Skysong thank you for reinforcing their archives!

name: Ember Surge
description: The Emberforge roars back to life. Extract molten cores before they cool and empower the forges.
participation: Brave the Emberforge Crater and run `!hy participate ember_surge` with molten loot in tow.
successMessage: Your efforts helped stabilize the ancient forge!

name: Stormfront Rally
description: A blizzard siege targets Stormguard Keep. Stand with the defenders and repel the assault.
participation: Join Stormguard patrols or defeat frost threats, then use `!hy participate stormfront`.
successMessage: Stormguard supplies have been replenished thanks to you!

name: Tidecall Echo
description: The Tidecaller choirs summon a protective tide. Help synchronize the hymn to keep the depths safe.
participation: Patrol ocean sanctums or defeat abyssal beasts, then run `!hy participate tidecall`.
successMessage: The Tidecallers bestow blessings upon their allies!

name: Caravan Convoy
description: Nomad caravans need escorts through sandstorm-struck dunes. Safeguard their journey to earn their trust.
participation: Protect caravans in the Howling Sands and run `!hy participate desert_caravan`.
successMessage: The caravans reach their destination thanks to your vigilance!

name: Sunforge Resurgence
description: The furnaces in the Sunforge badlands roar as ancient bellows awaken. Assist smiths in taming the surge.
participation: Gather emberglass shards or defeat lava-born foes, then run `!hy participate sunforge_resurgence`.
successMessage: Sunforge smiths stabilize the forges with your help!

name: Azure Regatta
description: Coral barges race across Azure Cove to renew tide wards. Keep the route clear and resupply sailors.
participation: Escort coral runners or bring tideglass pearls, then run `!hy participate azure_regatta`.
successMessage: The regatta finishes safely under your watch!

name: Wildvine Bloom
description: Wildvine glades erupt with rapid growth. Help Kweebec tenders harvest safely before the vines overrun nearby settlements.
participation: Collect wildvine blooms or defeat invading pests, then use `!hy participate wildvine_bloom`.
successMessage: The harvest is stored and the glade is balanced once more!

name: Mistspire Flux
description: Constellation flux ripples through Mistspire observatories. Stabilize resonance towers before they shatter.
participation: Calibrate resonance pylons or defeat void callers near Mistspire, then run `!hy participate mistspire_flux`.
successMessage: The Mistspire wardens salute your precision!

name: Stormbreak Raids
description: Privateer captains rally at Stormbreak Beacon to repel abyssal raiders. Assist in reinforcing the wards.
participation: Hunt raiders or repair beacon wards, then run `!hy participate stormbreak_raids`.
successMessage: Stormbreak remains secure thanks to your vigilance!

name: Dawnwatch Vigil
description: Dawnwatch eagles scout for marauders at first light. Join the vigil and deter any aerial threat.
participation: Escort scouts or drive off sky raiders, then run `!hy participate dawnwatch_vigil`.
successMessage: The cliffs remain safe beneath the Dawnwatch!

name: Everfrost Herd Migration
description: Everfrost mammoths migrate across the tundra and need guidance past razorfrost predators.
participation: Escort mammoths or repel predators, then run `!hy participate everfrost_herd`.
successMessage: The herd reaches new pastures under your protection!

name: Auric Convergence
description: Auric veins pulse beneath the dunes, drawing prospectors and raiders alike. Secure the sands for the caravan guilds.
participation: Deliver auric powder or defeat dune marauders, then run `!hy participate auric_convergence`.
successMessage: The guild ledger swells with auric riches!

name: Voidscar Reckoning
description: The Voidscar abyss churns with unstable rifts. Assist arcaneers in sequencing wards to contain the surge.
participation: Close rifts or defeat voidscar horrors near the chasm, then run `!hy participate voidscar_reckoning`.
successMessage: The abyss quiets—for now—thanks to your efforts!

name: Moonshadow Festival
description: Sprites host a festival in the Moonshadow thicket. Gather luminescent offerings to keep the revels safe.
participation: Collect moonshadow caps or soothe spectral visitors, then run `!hy participate moonshadow_festival`.
successMessage: The moonlit revelry continues in harmony!

name: Silverfin Ceremony
description: Silverfin shoals perform a shimmering migration. Protect the ceremony from abyssal predators.
participation: Defend the shoals or offer silverfin silk, then run `!hy participate silverfin_ceremony`.
successMessage: The sea shimmers in gratitude for your guardianship!

name: Stormlash Muster
description: Stormlash commanders call for reinforcements against a spike in wyvern raids.
participation: Hunt stormlash threats or deliver thunderite ore, then run `!hy participate stormlash_muster`.
successMessage: Stormlash lines hold strong with your reinforcements!

name: Skybreaker Bombardment
description: Skybreaker Bastion prepares a lightning barrage to repel invading airships. Assist crews in priming pylons.
participation: Stabilize storm pylons or defeat lightning saboteurs, then run !hy participate skybreaker_bombardment.
successMessage: The bastion thundered with a flawless volley thanks to you!

name: Emberlost Emergence
description: Spirits surge from the Emberlost foundry, seeking hosts. Contain the outbreak before it engulfs nearby camps.
participation: Quell ember spirits or deliver emberlost ingots, then run !hy participate emberlost_emergence.
successMessage: The foundry cools as the spirits are soothed and sealed.

name: Gilded Gala
description: The Gilded Courtyard hosts a radiant gala drawing nobles and artisans. Keep the festivities secure from jealous raiders.
participation: Escort gala envoys or present gilded leaves, then run !hy participate gilded_gala.
successMessage: The gala concludes in triumph, and the courtiers shower you with thanks!

name: Stormveil Cyclone
description: Cyclonic currents rip through Stormveil Ridge. Help ground the aeries and disperse the roiling winds.
participation: Defeat stormveil tempests or reinforce ridge anchors, then run !hy participate stormveil_cyclone.
successMessage: The cyclone breaks apart under your swift intervention!

name: Abyssal Convergence
description: Void currents spiral through the Abyssal Gulf, luring leviathans. Ward the convergence before it breaches the shallows.
participation: Drive back abyssal predators or bring abyssal gems, then run !hy participate abyssal_convergence.
successMessage: The convergence wanes and the gulf calms under your watch!

name: Tempest Convergence
description: The Howling Peaks crackle as rogue stormcores align. Stabilize the aeries before the tempest fractures the ridge.
participation: Disperse storm sentries or collect stormvein ore, then run !hy participate tempest_convergence.
successMessage: The stormguard salute your swift response as the convergence breaks apart!

name: Slagstorm Uprising
description: Ashbound broods in the Ember Depths awaken in unison. Break their ritual sites before slag hydras flood the caverns.
participation: Shatter magma wards or bring ember reagents, then run !hy participate slagstorm_uprising.
successMessage: The uprising collapses as the vents cool and the titans fall silent.

name: Gloomwild Revel
description: Twilight courts gather for a revel that risks spilling into nearby settlements. Broker the revel and keep the revelry contained.
participation: Appease veilhorn spirits or collect nightpetal blooms, then run !hy participate gloomwild_revel.
successMessage: The revel concludes in harmony and the fey courts grant their blessing.
